name: Plantastic!
description:
Plantastic!
is a simulation based game. The player has the opportunity to crossbread plants in a controlled area or in a slightly more uncontrolled environment. Controles: "WASD "-> Walk move "Mouse"-> View "Left mouse click" on Plants -> Drag Plant Release "left mouse click" -> Drop Plant "Right mouse click" on Plant -> Save in Inventory (currently buggy, one plant possible) "ESC" -> Open Menu "C" Overview of Island from above "F" on Plant -> Destroy Plant Copyright (c) 2018 and created by: Mehtap Kurucay

Longing - Joakim Karud


This game was created at the GameDesign//UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai and Florian Berger "Game Gardening Simulator"  (WinterSemester 2018/19)
